Hosea or Osee__12.1: Ephraim feedeth on the wind, and followeth the burning heat: all the day long he multiplied lies and desolation: and he hath made a covenant with the Assyrians, and carried oil into Egypt.
Hosea or Osee__12.2: Therefore there is a judgment of the Lord with Juda, and a visitation for Jacob: he will render to him according to his ways, and according to his devices.
Hosea or Osee__12.3: In the womb he supplanted his brother: and by his strength he had success with an angel.
Hosea or Osee__12.4: And he prevailed over the angel, and was strengthened: he wept, and made supplication to him: he found him in Bethel, and there he spoke with us.
Hosea or Osee__12.5: Even the Lord the God of hosts, the Lord is his memorial.
Hosea or Osee__12.6: Therefore turn thou to thy God: keep mercy and judgment, and hope in thy God always.
Hosea or Osee__12.7: He is like Chanaan, there is a deceitful balance in his hand, he hath loved oppression.
Hosea or Osee__12.8: And Ephraim said: But yet I am become rich, I have found me an idol: all my labours shall not find me the iniquity that I have committed.
Hosea or Osee__12.9: And I that am the Lord thy God from the land of Egypt, will yet cause thee to dwell in tabernacles, as in the days of the feast.
Hosea or Osee__12.10: And I have spoken by the prophets, and I have multiplied visions, and I have used similitudes by the ministry of the prophets.
Hosea or Osee__12.11:
<u>
                If Galaad be an idol
               </u>, then in vain were they in Galgal offering sacrifices with bullocks: for their altars also are as heaps in the furrows of the field.
Hosea or Osee__12.12: Jacob fled into the country of Syria, and Israel served for a wife, and was a keeper for a wife.
Hosea or Osee__12.13: But the Lord by a prophet brought Israel out of Egypt: and he was preserved by a prophet.
Hosea or Osee__12.14: Ephraim hath provoked me to wrath with his bitterness, and his blood shall come upon him, and his Lord will render his reproach unto him.
